arts.ttl: Transcript of part two of Ruben Amorim press conference ahead of Liverpool
arts.sum: “You have so many things to use with our players, like winning back-to-back games, to have that moment and that can change completely, and I felt like the game against Chelsea when we won, the week was so different. So, we have a lot of things to use with the players.

arts.ttl: Ruben Amorim makes Bruno Fernandes penalty decision ahead of Man United's clash with bitter rivals Liverpool amid star's woes from the spot this season
arts.sum: Fernandes failed from the spot against Brentford and Fulham , having previously only missed four of his 42 penalties since joining United in 2020.

arts.ttl: Liverpool vs Man United: Premier League Preview, Matchday 8, 2025
arts.sum: A player who has already proven to be pivotal to the success of the Reds might have gained even greater importance if the team are going to defend the Premier League title for the first time. The Red Devils hoped to banish the demons of the 2024/25 campaign for good with £200 million of spending in the summer to retool an attack that produced the fifth lowest goal tally in the Premier League .

arts.ttl: Report: Fabio Paratici to lead Tottenham’s pursuit of top Liverpool and Man United target with 28 goals, 13 assists
arts.sum: Fabio Paratici has returned to Tottenham in an official capacity as the club’s joint-sporting director. His return to the club is expected to have an impact on the club’s transfer strategies ahead of the transfer windows. The former Juventus man has a reputation of being an expert of the Italian market, having made some shrewd […] The post Report: Fabio Paratici to lead Tottenham’s pursuit of top Liverpool and Man United target with 28 goals, 13 assists appeared first on CaughtOffside.

arts.ttl: Salah vs. Fernandes: Who will have biggest say on Liverpool vs. Man United?
arts.sum: Mohamed Salah will hope to lead Liverpool to victory against Bruno Fernandes's Manchester United on Sunday, but who will have a bigger impact on the match?

arts.ttl: How Mbeumo, Yoro could help Man United overcome shaky Liverpool at Anfield
arts.sum: Manchester United duo Bryan Mbeumo and Leny Yoro could be vital to their side's chances of claiming a famous win over Liverpool at Anfield on Sunday afternoon.

arts.ttl: Liverpool could force Man Utd into costly Ruben Amorim decision due to contract clause
arts.sum: Ruben Amorim remains under pressure at Manchester United ahead of the Red Devils' trip to Liverpool

arts.ttl: 'Next Ryan Giggs' who joined Liverpool from Man Utd now makes £15m a year after quitting football
arts.sum: The talented forward had the world at his feet but a cruel injury blow saw him walk away from football for good

arts.ttl: Liverpool Predicted Lineup vs. Man Utd: Isak, Wirtz Aiming for Redemption at Anfield
arts.sum: Liverpool are eager to stop the rot after three successive defeats.

arts.ttl: Man Utd Predicted Lineup vs. Liverpool: Cunha Returns to Form Fabulous Front Three
arts.sum: Manchester United are searching for a first win at Anfield in almost a decade.
